body.name: Pampers Baby Wipes Refills, 576 count - Sensitive Water Based Hypoallergenic and Unscented Baby Wipes (Packaging May Vary)
features: Clinically Proven: Pampers Sensitive wipes are clinically proven for sensitive skin
Thick and soft: Gently cares for your baby’s delicate skin
Skin-Friendly: Gentle and hypoallergenic—0% alcohol, fragrance, parabens and latex* (*No rubbing alcohol and no natural rubber latex)
1-Wipe Pop-Top: Dispenses one wipe at a time so you only get what you need
Trustworthy: From Pampers, the #1 pediatrician recommended brand
Perfect Pairing: For healthy skin, use together with Pampers Swaddlers diapers
body.description: Clinically proven to protect your little one’s sensitive skin, Pampers Sensitive baby wipes are thick and soft for a gentle clean. Pampers Sensitive baby wipes are the #1 choice of hospitals** and are Skin Health Alliance Dermatologist approved. They are milder than a washcloth and water and help maintain skin’s natural pH. Pampers Sensitive baby wipes are hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, fragrance, parabens, and latex.* Plus, our convenient 1-Wipe pop-top is designed to dispense one wipe at a time, so you only get what you need to tackle the mess at-hand. From Pampers, the #1 pediatrician recommended brand. For healthy skin, use Pampers Sensitive wipes together with Pampers Swaddlers diapers. *No rubbing alcohol and no natural rubber latex **based on hospital sales data

productInformation.name: Safety warning
productInformation.value: ‎To avoid danger of suffocation, keep outer wrapper and plastic bags away from babies and children. Do not place in cribs, beds, carriages or playpens. Dispose of outer wrapper immediately. This is not a toy. Do not allow children to push fingers or hand through opening.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thick and Gentle As mild and gentle as using a washcloth and water, Sensitive wipes are ideal for the most sensitive baby skin. pH Balancing Made with simple, gentle ingredients, Sensitive wipes contain a touch of pH balancing lotion to help keep your baby’s skin healthy by maintaining skin’s natural pH One-Wipe Pop-Top Nothing is more frustrating than reaching for a wipe and getting three or four. That’s why our one-wipe pop-top is designed to help ensure you only get what you want. Pair with Swaddlers Diapers To help keep your baby’s skin dry and healthy, we recommend pairing Sensitive wipes with Pampers Swaddlers—our softest diapers made with our BreatheFree Liner that pulls wetness away from skin

Compare Our Wipes 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin 0% alcohol/parabens derma-tested 1-wipe pop-top fragrance free for sensitive skin

Our Commitment Caring for babies is in our DNA. Our Pampers Bright Beginnings programs enable healthy development and early success for babies and families through education, hospital partnerships, and donations March of Dimes Partnership Pampers is proud to support the March of Dimes in giving every baby a fighting chance. We help provide our smallest diapers to the 1 million babies born before 28-week gestational age each year Sustainability Pampers cares for every baby and the planet they grow up in. We maintain zero manufacturing to landfill across all our plants and are committed to 100% renewable electricity by 2030 Community Donations Through ongoing donation efforts and partnerships with organizations like Feeding America and Matthew 25, Pampers strives to help babies get the bright beginnings they deserve Changing Table Access 9 out of 10 dads have used a public restroom that lacks a changing table. As part of our “Love the Change” campaign, we’re providing 5,000 changing tables for men’s restrooms across North America Hospital Support Proud to be the #1 choice of U.S. hospitals for nearly 50 years, we partner with nurses to develop skin-protecting products and support nursing education—all to help baby’s healthy development

Are Pampers wipes safe for my newborn baby? Yes! Babies' health and safety are our first priority at Pampers with our hypoallergenic products that are free of parabens and latex. Our wipes are safe and are clinically proven for sensitive skin. Dermatologist approved Are these wipes flushable? No. Our baby wipes are thick and gentle and are not designed to be flushed Which diaper should I use with Pampers Sensitive baby wipes? We recommend using Pampers Swaddlers diapers with Pampers Sensitive wipes together for healthy skin. Pampers Swaddlers diapers are softer and made with our BreatheFree Liner that provides breathability and pulls wetness away from the skin How does pH affect my baby's skin? Urine and bowel movements have pH levels that vary from baby's skin and are further affected by diet and health. When higher or lower pH levels contact skin, they can cause irritation. To help prevent irritation, pH must be balanced or neutralized Do Pampers wipes come with a pop-top? Yes! Pampers Sensitive wipes are available with either a pop-top or refill pack which can be used in wipes containers. Our pop-tops come with a one-wipe dispensing lid so you only get the wipes you need

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift to my god son
reviews.reviewText: It was well appreciated by the parents and was easy to use, durable and good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only wipes we will use
reviews.reviewText: Our first son had sensitive skin and these were the only wipes that didn't give him any type of rash/ skin reaction. We are now on baby number 2 and we still swear by these wipes. They are the right amount of wet and great for sensitive skin. One wipe goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good for sensitive skin and good value for price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipe, Wipe, BABY
reviews.reviewText: Preferred wipe on the market. These get the job done and don’t irritate baby’s skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only wipes I use on my sensitive kids.
reviews.reviewText: My oldest has been prone to diaper rash since the day she came home from the hospital. We immediately had to change over what brand of diapers we used and we have tried tons of different creams, but she has always done well with these wipes. As we had more kids, we kept returning to these. They are much softer than some other wipes and a good thickness. I feel like I can get a lot with these. These are hands down our favorite wipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use these to clean the facemask on my C-PAP machine every morning. Wipe and done. No strong scent when I use it again that night. No irritation of my nose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great diaper for sensitive skin. Great value. Shipped quick.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a friend that had a baby registry with Amazon. Great diaper for sensitive skin. Great value. Shipped quick. Highly recommend.
